statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); project=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // empty'); [ -n "$used" ] && context_info=" | Context: ${used}%" || context_info=""; printf "\033[2m%s | %s | Project: %s | Style: %s%s\033[0m" "$model" "$cwd" "$project" "$style" "$context_info"
